93 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
94 // Class template stGenericMatrix
95 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
104 template < class Type > class stGenericMatrix{
105  public:
110  stGenericMatrix(){
111  Rows = 0;
112  Cols = 0;
113  DataSize = 0;
114  PRowsSize = 0;
115  Data = NULL;
116  PRows = NULL;
117  }//end stGenericMatrix
118 
125  stGenericMatrix(int cols, int rows){
126  Data = NULL;
127  SetSize(cols, rows);
128  }//end stGenericMatrix
129 
133  ~stGenericMatrix(){
134 
135  if (Data != NULL){
136  delete[] Data;
137  }//end if
138  if (PRows != NULL){
139  delete[] PRows;
140  }//end if
141  }//end ~stGenericMatrix
142 
149  void SetSize(int cols, int rows);
150 
154  int GetRows(){
155  return Rows;
156  }//end GetRows
157 
161  int GetCols(){
162  return Cols;
163  }//end GetCols
164 
171  Type & Get(int row, int col){
172  return (*this)[row][col];
173  }//end Get
174 
181  Type * operator [] (int row){
182  return PRows[row];
183  }//end operator []
184 
185  private:
186 
190  int Rows;
191 
195  int Cols;
196 
200  int DataSize;
201 
205  int PRowsSize;
206 
210  Type * Data;
211 
215  Type ** PRows;
216 };//end stGenericMatrix

241

249  PRows = NULL;
250  SetSize(cols, rows);
251  }//end stHugeGenericMatrix
252 
256  virtual ~stHugeGenericMatrix();

324 // Structure stDistanceIndex
325 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
334 typedef struct stDistanceIndex{
338  int Index;
339 
343  double Distance;
344 
348  stDistanceIndex() : Index(0), Distance(0) {};
349 
350  struct stDistanceIndex & operator = (const struct stDistanceIndex & x){
351  this->Distance = x.Distance;
352  this->Index = x.Index;
353  return (*this);
354  }//end operator =
355 
356 } stDistanceIndex;
357 
367 bool operator < (const stDistanceIndex & x, const stDistanceIndex & y);

369 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
370 // template MinN
371 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
380 template <class T> int MinN(int n, T * values){
381  int i;
382  int min;
383 
384  min = 0;
385  for (i = 1; i < n; i++){
386  if (values[i] < values[min]){
387  min = i;
388  }//end if
389  }//end for
390 
391  return min;
392 }//end MinN
393 
394 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
395 // template MaxN
396 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
405 template <class T> int MaxN(int n, T * values){
406  int i;
407  int min;
408 
409  min = 0;
410  for (i = 1; i < n; i++){
411  if (values[i] > values[min]){
412  min = i;
413  }//end if
414  }//end for
415 
416  return min;
417 }//end MinN
418 
419 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
420 // Function TriangularInequality
421 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
432 inline bool TriangularInequality(stDistance ab, stDistance ac,
433  stDistance bc){
434 
435  return (ab + ac >= bc) && (ab + bc >= ac);
436 }//end TriangularInequality

438 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
439 // template class stRPriorityQueue
440 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
470 template <class TKey, class TValue>
471 class stRPriorityQueue{
472  public:
478  stRPriorityQueue(int maxSize){
479  this->maxSize = maxSize;
480  this->size = 0;
481  entries = new tEntry[maxSize];
482  }//end maxSize
483 
487  ~stRPriorityQueue(){
488  if (entries != NULL){
489  delete[] entries;
490  }//end if
491  }//end ~stRPriorityQueue
492 
501  bool Get(TKey & key, TValue & value);
502 
512  void Add(const TKey & key, const TValue & value);
513 
517  int GetSize(){
518  return size;
519  }//end GetSize
520  private:
524  struct tEntry{
528  TKey key;
532  TValue value;
533  };//end tEntry
534 
538  tEntry * entries;
539 
543  int maxSize;
544 
548  int size;
549 
556  int GetMinChild(int parent){
557  int c = (parent * 2) + 1;
558 
559  if ((c + 1 < size) && (entries[c + 1].key < entries[c].key)){
560  return c + 1;
561  }else{
562  if (c < size){
563  return c;
564  }else{
565  return -1;
566  }//end if
567  }//end if
568  }//end GetMinChild
569 };//end stRPriorityQueue

573 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
597 template <class TKey, class TValue>
598 class stDynamicRPriorityQueue{
599  public:
621  stDynamicRPriorityQueue(int initialSize, int increment = 32){
622  this->increment = increment;
623  this->maxSize = initialSize;
624  this->size = 0;
625  entries = new tEntry[maxSize];
626  }//end stDynamicRPriorityQueue
627 
631  ~stDynamicRPriorityQueue(){
632  if (entries != NULL){
633  delete[] entries;
634  }//end if
635  }//end ~stDynamicRPriorityQueue
636 
645  bool Get(TKey & key, TValue & value);
646 
654  void Add(const TKey & key, const TValue & value);
655 
659  int GetSize(){
660  return size;
661  }//end GetSize
662  private:
666  struct tEntry{
670  TKey key;
674  TValue value;
675  };//end tEntry
676 
680  tEntry * entries;
681 
685  int maxSize;
686 
690  int size;
691 
695  int increment;
696 
703  int GetMinChild(int parent){
704  int c = (parent * 2) + 1;
705 
706  if ((c + 1 < size) && (entries[c + 1].key < entries[c].key)){
707  return c + 1;
708  }else{
709  if (c < size){
710  return c;
711  }else{
712  return -1;
713  }//end if
714  }//end if
715  }//end GetMinChild
716 
721  void Resize();
722 
723 };//end stDynamicRPriorityQueue

788  }//end ~stDynamicRReversedPriorityQueue

814  }//end GetSize
815 
816  private:
820  struct tEntry{
824  TKey key;
828  TValue value;
829  };//end tEntry
830 
834  tEntry * entries;

839  int maxSize;
840 
844  int size;
845 
849  int increment;
850 
857  int GetMinChild(int parent){
858  int c = (parent * 2) + 1;
859 
860  if ((c + 1 < size) && (entries[c + 1].key > entries[c].key)){
861  return c + 1;
862  }else{
863  if (c < size){
864  return c;
865  }else{
866  return -1;
867  }//end if
868  }//end if
869  }//end GetMinChild

877 };//end stDynamicRReversedPriorityQueue

881 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
894 typedef struct stQueryPriorityQueueValue{
898  stPageID PageID;
899 
903  stDistance Radius;
904 
905  #ifdef __stMAMVIEW__
906 
909  stPageID Parent;
910 
914  int Level;
915  #endif //__stMAMVIEW__
916 
922  const stQueryPriorityQueueValue & operator = (const stQueryPriorityQueueValue & v){
923 
924  this->PageID = v.PageID;
925  this->Radius = v.Radius;
926  #ifdef __stMAMVIEW__
927  this->Parent = v.Parent;
928  this->Level = v.Level;
929  #endif //__stMAMVIEW__
930  return *this;
931  }//end operator =
932 } stQueryPQueueValue;

935 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
936 // Random utility functions
937 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
945 #define drand() (((double)rand())/((double)RAND_MAX))
946 
958 #define rngrand(low, hi) ((((hi) - (low)) * drand()) + (low))
959 
970 #define randomevent(p) (drand() <= (p))

995 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
996 // Class template stInstanceAllocator
997 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1009 template < class ClassType> class stInstanceAllocator{
1010  public:
1014  ClassType * Create(){
1015  return new ClassType();
1016  }//end Create
1017 
1021  void Dispose(ClassType * instance){
1022  delete instance;
1023  }//end Dispose
1024 };//end stInstanceAllocator
1025 
1026 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1027 // Class template stInstanceCache
1028 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1056 template < class ClassType, class AllocatorType> class stInstanceCache{
1057  public:
1065  stInstanceCache(int capacity, AllocatorType * allocator){
1066  this->allocator = allocator;
1067  this->capacity = capacity;
1068  this->instances = new ClassType * [capacity];
1069  this->size = 0;
1070  }//end stInstance
1071 
1075  ~stInstanceCache();
1076 
1080  ClassType * Get(){
1081  if (size > 0){
1082  size--;
1083  return instances[size];
1084  }else{
1085  return allocator->Create();
1086  }//end if
1087  }//end Get
1088 
1094  void Put(ClassType * instance){
1095  if (size < capacity){
1096  instances[size] = instance;
1097  size++;
1098  }else{
1099  allocator->Dispose(instance);
1100  }//end if
1101  }//end Put
1102 
1103  private:
1104 
1108  ClassType ** instances;
1109 
1113  int size;
1114 
1118  int capacity;
1119 
1123  AllocatorType * allocator;
1124 
1125 };//end stInstanceCache

1127 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1128 // Class stMessageString
1129 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1139 class stMessageString{
1140 
1141  public:
1142 
1148  void Append(const char * str){
1149  this->str.append(str);
1150  }//end Append
1151 
1157  void Append(double d){
1158  char tmp[32];
1159  sprintf(tmp, "%f", d);
1160  Append(tmp);
1161  }//end Append
1162 
1168  void Append(int i){
1169  char tmp[32];
1170  sprintf(tmp, "%d", i);
1171  Append(tmp);
1172  }//end Append
1173 
1177  void Clear(){
1178  str = "";
1179  }//end Clear
1180 
1184  const char * GetStr(){
1185  return str.c_str();
1186  }//end GetStr
1187 
1188  private:
1189 
1193  string str;
1194 
1195 };//end stMessageString
